price: 37. Or, ils l’accusèrent de mensonge, et le Tremblement (de terre) les saisit, les laissant, le lendemain, inertes dans leurs maisons.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-akhadhathumu al-rajfatu fa-aṣbaḥū fī dārihim jāthimīna
